author: lightclient
content:
I've been working with <@413837916066938880> on a draft for the EraE format which will be used for post-merge history archiving - and potentially pre-merge too! PTAL and let me know what you think.

Main changes are:
- sequential storage of like-types, e.g. all headers, then all bodies, etc to support range queries. although the downside of this is the index gets bigger
- added `Proof` element to store beacon / block proof so everything can be verified if a user has a trusted beacon root from some point in time
- changed receipt format since (AFAIK) most clients don't actually store the true 2718 format - so this should be much more optimal for client usage
- block index changed to support multiple offsets for each block. just read `count` and `component-count` from the end of the file, then you can jump to the exact offset for the component you need
